name: Joy Chugh
body:
### Joy Chugh.
Software Engineer at [Millennial Media](http://www.millennialmedia.com/).
Designing and implementing high throughput and scalable applications powering more than 12 billion programmatic ad requests a day. Visit [my professional profile](joychugh.com) on LinkedIn. Most of my work here is when I am trying to learn something new.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
